bioconda.summary: Automates the update cycle and the supervision of the locally mirrored databank repository

biocontainers.name: biomaj
biocontainers.summary: Biomaj is a workflow engine dedicated to data synchronization and processing. the software automates the update cycle and the supervision of the locally mirrored databank repository.

biotools.summary: BioMAJ is a workflow engine dedicated to data synchronization and processing. The Software automates the update cycle and the supervision of the locally mirrored databank repository.

bioschemas.name: BioMAJ
bioschemas.summary: BioMAJ is a workflow engine dedicated to data synchronization and processing. The Software automates the update cycle and the supervision of the locally mirrored databank repository.
